trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers for <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含用來作為識別項的值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> exposes detailed information of the textual contents of objects such as edit controls and documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>公開的詳細資訊物件，例如編輯控制項和文件的文字內容。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should be written so that they can work in a partial-trust environment.
trans-unit.target: 應該寫入使用者介面自動化提供者，以便它們可以在部分信任環境下運作。

trans-unit.source: Because UIAutomationClient.dll is not configured for full trust, your provider code should not reference that assembly.
trans-unit.target: 因為 UIAutomationClient.dll 未設定完全信任，您的提供者程式碼不應該參考該組件。

trans-unit.source: If it does so, the code may run in a full-trust environment but then fail in a partial-trust environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果這樣做，程式碼可能會在完全信任環境中執行，但無法在部分信任環境。

trans-unit.source: In particular, do not use fields from classes in UIAutomationClient.dll such as those in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，不會使用來自 UIAutomationClient.dll 中類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>的欄位

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the equivalent fields from classes in UIAutomationTypes.dll, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: 請改用來自 UIAutomationTypes.dll 中類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementIdentifiers>的對等欄位

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle"></xref> attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle"></xref>文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not.
trans-unit.target: 僅限螢幕上出現的動畫動畫的文字列印，但動畫並不會生效。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.AnimationStyle>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the [BackgroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別[BackgroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`null`參考 (`Nothing`中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle"></xref> attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle"></xref>文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle"></xref> attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle"></xref>文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.CapStyle>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the Culture (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>) attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French–Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).
trans-unit.target: 識別文化特性 (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>) 的語言層級文字範圍的屬性; 例如，而不是法文 (fr) (fr CH) 瑞士。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] for more detail on the language code format.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]的語言代碼格式的其他詳細資料。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The default value is the language of the application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 預設值是應用程式的語言[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 可能是伺服器不支援語言標記，或作者不能使用它。

trans-unit.source: In those cases the default applies.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下會套用預設值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `FontName` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`FontName`文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Examples include "Arial Black" and "Arial Narrow".
trans-unit.target: 範例包括"新細明體"和"新細明體 Narrow"。

trans-unit.source: Values are non-localized.
trans-unit.target: 值為非當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is an `empty string`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`empty string`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `FontSize` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`FontSize`文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `zero`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `FontWeight` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`FontWeight`文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the relative stroke, thickness or boldness of a font.
trans-unit.target: 是指相對筆劃、 粗細或字型的粗細。

trans-unit.source: This is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in [GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp).
trans-unit.target: 這建立`lfWeight`欄位[GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp)。

trans-unit.source: For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black.
trans-unit.target: 為了保持一致性，下列的值已採用 LOGFONT 從︰ 0 = DontCare，100 = 細，200 = ExtraLight 或 UltraLight，300 = 光線，400 = Normal 或 Regular，500 = 中，600 = SemiBold 或 DemiBold，700 = 粗體，800 = ExtraBold 或 UltraBold，以及 900 = 繁重或黑色。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `zero`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the [ForegroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) ([COLORREF](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別[ForegroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) ([COLORREF](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)) 的文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Foreground color is equivalent to the text or font color.
trans-unit.target: 前景色彩就相當於文字或字型色彩。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`null`參考 (`Nothing`中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment"></xref> attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment"></xref>文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal text alignment applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 水平文字對齊方式套用到呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的段落。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment> The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment>
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment>預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.HorizontalTextAlignment>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `IndentationFirstLine` (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`IndentationFirstLine`(<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>) 的文字範圍的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>

trans-unit.source: The first-line indentation (specified as a <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> unit type value) applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 第一行縮排 (指定為<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>單位類型的值) 套用到呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的段落。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `zero`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `zero`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.

trans-unit.target: 識別`IndentationTrailing`(<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>) 的文字範圍的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph.TextIndent*>

trans-unit.source: The trailing indentation (specified as a <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> unit type value) applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 尾端的縮排 (指定為<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>單位類型的值) 套用到呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的段落。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>

trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `zero`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.

trans-unit.target: 識別`IsHidden`文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `IsReadOnly` attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`IsReadOnly`文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端文字範圍的相關文件的唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 文件或檔案是唯讀的但您仍可以編輯它，及將它儲存為另一個檔案，如果文字不是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `MarginBottom` (<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`MarginBottom`(<xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>) 的文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin applied to the page(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 下邊界套用到呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The trailing margin applied to the page(s) associated with the calling text range.
trans-unit.target: 與呼叫端文字範圍相關聯的頁面所套用的尾端邊界。

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the value of a given attribute varies over a text range in a rich edit control.
trans-unit.target: 識別在 rich edit 控制項中的文字範圍內會變動，指定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetAttributeValue%2A> returns `TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue` to indicate this variation instead of a collection of attribute values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetAttributeValue%2A>傳回`TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue`來表示這項差異，而不是屬性值的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetAttributeValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `Tabs` attribute of a text range.

trans-unit.source: The collection of tab stops has each tab stop specified as a <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> unit type value.
trans-unit.target: 定位停駐點的集合已指定為每個定位點<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>單位類型的值。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值為<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>類型的陣列

trans-unit.source: The default value is an `empty` array.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`empty`陣列。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised whenever textual content is modified.
trans-unit.target: 識別文字內容有修改時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `TextFlowDirections` (<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections"></xref>) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`TextFlowDirections`(<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections"></xref>) 的文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>

trans-unit.source: The default value is the bitwise combination of the following values: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是下列值的位元組合︰ <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> `|` <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.FlowDirections>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised whenever the text selection is modified.
trans-unit.target: 識別修改文字選取範圍時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved.
trans-unit.target: 某些文字控制項處理為零寬度的文字選取範圍的文字插入點 （游標），並可能會引發`TextSelectionChangedEvent`游標移動時。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.TextSelectionChangedEvent>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 若要依照資料指標移動，使用者介面自動化用戶端建議保留追蹤所接聽的相對應的插入點變更[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目事件，而不是取決於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.TextSelectionChangedEvent>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.TextSelectionChangedEvent>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] providers.
trans-unit.target: 這個識別碼由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]提供者。

trans-unit.source: Client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 識別`UnderlineColor`文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the `UnderlineStyle` (<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle"></xref>) attribute of a text range.
trans-unit.target: 識別`UnderlineStyle`(<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle"></xref>) 的文字範圍的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: Values for this attribute are of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值屬於型別<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextDecorationLineStyle>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
